name: Crypt Walker (Noob)
description:
The very first game I ever made, the writing is probably terrible, and it might be buggy. But I slaved over it for a long time and got excited to share.

All images are taken from: https://pixabay.com

Made with: Twine 2 Harlowe

Feedback is much appreciated.

Notes: This game doesn't have a save function!

If your game hangs up it's supposed to do that, please wait for a response.
